website_summaries.verdict: Nice shades, creamy texture, and low price have made this eyeliner a long-time popular choice among consumers who prefer a traditional pencil for an affordable price.
pros: Made by Cover Girl, a brand known for quality and affordable cosmetics for generations
Classic pencil is easy to sharpen, and keeps a stable tip that's easy to use
Has a smudger, and provides pretty colors and reasonable wear for many consumers who try it
cons: Some liners seemed old or stale, as they arrived dried out and crumbly
Not all shades are bold, but they are buildable
Not ideal for drawing  precise lines or wings

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PENCIL!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pencil! It's very pigmented and it stayed on all day. Perfect for eyebrows and lip liner too. Here is a pic of me wearing it on my brows, lips, and eyes.
customer_reviews.author: LASHEENA  HARRIS

customer_reviews.title: CoverGirl Perfect Blend Eye Pencil Black/Brown
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for at least 20 or so years. I blend it in with my Prestige Liquid Eyeliner, also a Black/Brown Color. At this price I’m buying 2 at a time. It’s a great product, and is also waterproof. I’m enclosing a selfie that was taken last year in natural lighting, so you can see my eye makeup. By the way, I sometimes blend this in also with my eyeshadow. It’s a staple of my eye makeup, and I always have at least 3 or 4.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Watts

customer_reviews.title: It's a great alternative for black if you want something less harsh ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this charcoal eyeliner for over 10 years. I have tried others but I always come back to it. It's a great alternative for black if you want something less harsh and it has a tiny bit of shimmer in it which brightens the eyes. I also use black mascara and it makes a great combo for daily wear. It will last all day and does not smudge. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: ... with my Urban Decay liner pencils which glide on like butter. I decided to try this to see ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been spoiled with my Urban Decay liner pencils which glide on like butter. I decided to try this to see if a less expensive product would give equally good results, and the answer (at least regarding CoverGirl) is no. This pencil is actually somewhat painful to apply because it doesn't draw on easily and requires several heavy passes to get a decent looking line. But once it's on, it's not going anywhere... I have to scrub at my eyes with makeup remover to get this stuff off. My eyes do not thank me. I haven't tried the blending feature at all, so I can't comment on that aspect.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy T.

customer_reviews.title: Also works awesome as a eyebrow pencil
customer_reviews.text: I know this is an eyeliner pencil but I actually use it to fill in my eye brows. Having a light skin tone and light eyebrows it’s difficult to find the right shade that doesn’t look too dark, too red, or too green. This Works perfectly with the color of my brows. It doesn’t smudge off during the day and looks way more natural than the eyebrow pencil shades typically do.
customer_reviews.author: TeenerJoy

customer_reviews.title: Finally able to find a pencil
customer_reviews.text: I've been having a tough time finding eyeliner pencils in the drug store lately. They sell the type that you have to twist in order to use. They are a thin stick and they break easily. Turned to Amazon to find an eyeliner pencil. This one does the trick. Color is as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Leeleeburd

customer_reviews.title: Great for Eyebrows!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite pencil for defining my eyebrows. It's hard to find this color on the shelf, so I am very happy to be able to order it at Amazon. It is on my Subscribe and Save List. Easy to sharpen without breaking the point, which was hard on previous pencils I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: P. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Color!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why, but it has been nearly impossible to find this particular pencil and color in the beauty aisle of the store! As I've gotten older, my hair has gone mostly grey with some brown, and what little hair is left on my eyebrows is very grey. I needed to put some color where my eyebrows used to be and still look natural with my hair and skin. I was very happy to find this product online. "Charcoal Neutral" is just perfect if, like me, your hair is grey and your eyebrows are invisible.
customer_reviews.author: J Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. I used to use these all the time in my too-much-eyeliner phase in high school, and I recently rediscovered it after bad attempts using other brands. I really like that it's easy to sharpen to a fine point for an understated look. It's inexpensive enough that I don't feel bad sharpening it often. It has caused mild irritation if I go too close to my water line, but most of the time it's fine. Oh, and Amazon has Walmart beat on the price, so that's a huge plus. I plan to order here again in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was hoping for.  Doesn't last,don't bother.
customer_reviews.text: Ot as happy with this eyeliner as I'd like. It doesn't glide on very smoothly, nor does it leave a nice crisp line of color. I have to go over it several times to get a passable co,or, and it disappears into my skin after just an hour or two. If it doesn't disappear, it leaves me with raccoon eyes after just an hour or two. It's very unpredictable, except I can predict it won't look good for long. I keep on trying to find a good eyeliner that isn't super expensive, I know there's one out there.
customer_reviews.author: LucyLu

customer_reviews.title: Never use anything else for my brows
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this simple but awesome pencil for decades. It's simply the best for brows. I've tried other new products from time to time, the microblade pens, the powders, the brow gels, but NONE give the right look. This pencil is easy to use, and I think what I like best about it is that Cover Girl must be the only brand that makes a charcoal color. The color of a brow pencil is critical! My brows are not black and they aren't reddish warm brown, either. They are a neutral brown and the charcoal color is PERFECT. The result is a natural-looking brow every time. Please, never stop making this!
customer_reviews.author: Lorenza

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: The "charcoal" color is light gray and doesn't go on! It hurts too bad to press hard enough to get any on your eye lid. I don't know how other people did it!
customer_reviews.author: atyk2018

customer_reviews.title: Smudges badly
customer_reviews.text: I got sent two of these instead of one so I was super happy until I wore it and realized it is only worth a few dollars as it will not stay on my eyes it smudges and melts off and gives me raccoon eyes worse than any other black eyeliner I’ve ever used lol. Maybe I wil try to use it in the winter... but for summer in New Jersey it’s not cutting it. I will probably end up giving at least one of them away.
customer_reviews.author: C. Eres

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This pencil is too waxy and I can barely get it on as eyeliner. I feel like I am gouging my eyes trying to get a little line. I have an old pencil from the Body Shop that is the best! I will have to find one or theirs again.
customer_reviews.author: retrodaisy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product beyond satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brand and color eyebrow pencil for approximately thirty years! I absolutely love it. It applies extremely well. It stays on extremely well. It comes off with regular soap and water. Gray eyebrow pencils are extremely difficult to find and I am grateful that cover girl has not discontinue this.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Leslie Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Is this the same formula?
customer_reviews.text: I usually love Covergirl perfect blend eyeliner pencil in basic black. I always use it because it is soft and glides on easily. These pencils I received look the same, but they are mostly hard and do not glide on easily. I have to keep going over the same line. It does not even look as dark. Does not look as good. Did they change the formula? Or is this not really Covergirl? Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT what you expect from an eyebrow or eyeliner pencil.
customer_reviews.text: It is a soft smudgy tipped thing - it smears and does not last. I want a real pencil like I have always bought. Don't think you are getting a real pencil, it is like a tip of charcoal in a plastic wrap. Crumbles and smears. Hate it.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Classics never go out of style
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with a classic. As a self-confessed make up horder I just love this liner. It's what I first learned to use and I use it still. For a multiple of things like brows, eyes, lips. It's an all around liner. Always keep it in my arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: immichou

customer_reviews.title: Am happy I can just click and order it without running ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this item locally but it's often out of stock. Am happy I can just click and order it without running all over town looking for it. Normally I do not like to have to sharpen wooden pencil cosmetics but I wipe the shavings off with a damp tissue so no splinters get into my eyes. It's a smooth crayon that doesn't clump. I have recommended it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: beach9JONES

customer_reviews.title: Great color, but tends to smear
customer_reviews.text: With my salt and pepper hair I like to use charcoal grey eye color. This pencil is creamy but firm enough to sharpen. It does tend to smear on my eyes when it's hot outside. I add eyeshadow after applying liner, and that helps. I love the color. A staple for me, and a great color for bringing out hazel eyes like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Eve StarrTop Contributor: Crochet

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Apply a little goes along way.
customer_reviews.text: One of my essentials I like this use it all the time I am not a heavy user of eye liner this gives a little or if you want more you apply more. But for me a little goes along way just enough for me and like the smoothing out side on other end. I use nothing else. I use Brown/Black I am very light skinned so black too dark. You can make thin line if you don't use smoothing out pad. You use to the pad on other end to soften the look out. Not irritating to skin to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Not Strong
customer_reviews.text: I mean this item is cheap and you get what you pay for so I shouldn't be surprised. The color is nice but the issue is its not strong and breaks very easily. If you want a sharo point you have to use a sharpener constantly and thus go through it very quickly. Also means when applying it brakes as you use it. The smudger isn't goid either I find using a brush to be a better option.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Decent. Easy to apply. Stays put.
customer_reviews.text: Decent eyebrow pencil. So glad they had charcoal grey. Stays put and easy to apply. Wish the blending end was a brush but still a decent pencil
customer_reviews.author: TKG

customer_reviews.title: 🤎 Great Buy!!! 🤎
customer_reviews.text: On my repeat list!!! Just wish it would last longer, but then, that is probably because I use Quite a Bit!!! 😳 Lasts throughout the day just Great though.... and shades out well. 🤎 Great Buy!!! 🤎
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Lea

customer_reviews.title: The best pencil eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favorite pencil liner for years. The formula is nice and easy to apply. It goes on smooth and evenly. It is easy to sharpen too. I perfer pencil liners for a more natural/slightly softer look. It's really nice quality and lasts for ever!
customer_reviews.author: Liz C

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend, bad color transfer, smudgy, not good
customer_reviews.text: I usually get a Revlon pencil type. With the stores closed I couldn't find it on here so I tried this one because it was too rated. I have no clue why it is! Bad color transfer, have to go over and over. Then by the end of the day it's smudgy. After using a really great eyeliner and then going to this it's a HUGE difference. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ann

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT COLOR. Just doesn't last as long as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Joan H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner goes on smooth and it is brown, not black like so many brown eyeliners that I have tried. It smudges nicely with the provided sponge tip to make the line look less harsh. I'm definitely getting more of these!
customer_reviews.author: E. Ward

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: My favorite eye pencil! I’ve used all kinds of expensive ones & I think these work the best. Great value for my money. These pencils also last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: April Burke

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, breaks easily . I cannot even sharpen it without it breaking. I threw it away. It did not last thru the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Ancient_Warrior_Collector

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner pencil takes me back to my teens- when we use to warm the eyeliner with a lighter to make it soft and darker. It is hard on the delicate eye skin and once it hits the bathroom floor the ‘lead’ of the pencil is internally broken so it just breaks whenever you try to sharpen. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: SA Workman

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup staple
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this type of covergirl eyeliner (have in multiple colors) for a while. It goes on super easily & I always get asked if it is liquid liner. The smudge tip is a nice option but I hardly use it. Pencil lasts for a long time & it easy to sharpen into perfect point.
customer_reviews.author: Shanster84

customer_reviews.title: NO
customer_reviews.text: It burns badly am not using it, only once did I apply, very irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid it would be one of those eyeliners that didn't show up or was extremely light. This goes on dark so I can see it. It is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful eyes created
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this line of eyeliner for over a decade now. I love it and will never change hi liners. It is perfect when applying, Perfect When taking off, and perfect while wearing. Does not smudge at all and it is long-lasting.
customer_reviews.author: CS Coffing

customer_reviews.title: Been using them for years
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I am so glad they can be found at such a great price but I would pay more if I had to. They are great. Goes on smoother than other brands and I love the smudger on the other end
customer_reviews.author: Cazbaz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Finally I got a good eye liner! Stays well and my eyes look so beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Edmeia D'Brito

customer_reviews.title: My go-to eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for its color, which isn't that easy to find, and for its ease of application. I enjoy experimenting with colors, but this is the one that gives me the look I like best. It's so me.:)
customer_reviews.author: heartstrove

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Eye Pencil
customer_reviews.text: I love this simple eye pencil and have used for years. Never drags on the skin. Can't find locally and happy to have found them here for such a great price. Please don't quit making them!
customer_reviews.author: kchris1212

customer_reviews.title: smooth
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I'm not trying to wear black eyeliner anymore. I can easily glide this on and smudge it out and does a great job because it does require a lot of precision like black winged liner. Great for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Yep best one out there Love it East to apply You don’t have to push to hard on sensitive eye area It goes on nice and easy
customer_reviews.author: PCT2020

customer_reviews.title: very good purchase
customer_reviews.text: this is my favorite eyeliner. it's much easier to apply than any liquid liner, and the eraser makes it easy to get precise wings. it does tend to rub off somewhat by the end of the day, but reapplying in the middle of the day solves that problem. i love this eyeliner!
customer_reviews.author: Alida Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product! Exactly as advertised. Works great! I use nearly everyday and haven’t had any issues whatsoever. Love it! Will definitely purchase again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Trista Tallman

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: The pencil does not glide on smoothly like it should for eyeliner. So if you can get it on it would look good but I couldn't so it came off right away
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Skyberg

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and perfect product
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product i can do a wing perfectly with this pencil only. It drys up matte and it doesn’t smear easy without the sponge brush it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Camila Gomez

customer_reviews.title: 😎
customer_reviews.text: Love how dark it is great quality for low cost Ig@zabrayra
customer_reviews.author: Malika Z Hightower

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only pencil eyeliner I will ever use!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: very hard to get color
customer_reviews.text: This pencil itself was so hard, it hurt to get any kind of color to appear when I put it on my eye. I sharpened it to see if it had some type of coating on it, but that didn't help. I am not using it. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kris R

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find color!
customer_reviews.text: I've looked all over the store for a pencil to go with my white hair. If applied sparingly, this works great!
customer_reviews.author: Cheerful Grammie

customer_reviews.title: I was quite satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I was quite satisfied with this product. The pigmentation is great, I don't need to reapply it during the day, and it is easy to apply. One thing I have found is that it can EASILY leave a mark of clothing or pillow cases, but it doesn't smear off a lot. The only time I need to reapply is when I forget I have it on, and I lay my head down or rub my eyes, but other than that, I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Essence

customer_reviews.title: A perfect eyeliner.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t find these anywhere! Of course when you finally find a product you can’t live without the major store discontinue it! The eyeliner goes effortlessly and stays on throughout the day without fading, smearing, running or smudging! It’s absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Middletown Mom

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't Recommend (not really Black)
customer_reviews.text: States the color is black, but it goes on grey (no matter how hard you push)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Dee

customer_reviews.title: only kind i will buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the only kind of eyeliner i will buy. I have been buying it for years and everyone ask what kind of eyeliner do i use. You only have to apply it once and it last all day. I would really recommend it. It goes on smoothly and is very dark black just as the color states. I like that it comes with a blend-able sponge on the end of it. They are easy to sharpen as well. They also last a really long time even if you wear it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: "Perfect" is right
customer_reviews.text: This really is a perfect eyeliner pencil. Smudgeable (if that's a word), but it stays where you put it until you wash it off. Goes on easy and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: scratchcook

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay clean
customer_reviews.text: If I use this eyeliner in the morning, by noon half an inch below my eyes are horribly black! I had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Maryam Kohram

customer_reviews.title: Keeps breaking off while using.....
customer_reviews.text: Love the color but the pencil breaks off while using it This also happened with previous pencil but I thought it was a fluke.
customer_reviews.author: online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Just another pencil
customer_reviews.text: Just another pencil to store because it is regular I'm still searching for a good one with low price, and yet that was not the one
customer_reviews.author: Zara

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than it Appears but good
customer_reviews.text: The 4 stars are because I thought it was bigger. But it was quite small. However, it met expectations as far as what its meant for
customer_reviews.author: M.S.W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this eyeliner best pencil ever. Was worried when I purchased online instead of in store but it is just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Junior Amanda

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This has always been my favorite eyeliner. It stays out ALL day on my waterline. I’ve been using it for years.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: I an very satisfied with my purchase. I'm a CoverGirl fan anyway, but this liner goes on smoothly and stays on neatly throughout the day. With all my mom wear and tear, it's a great product by far. Highly recommend, all of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Like This Color
customer_reviews.text: This color doesn't even show up on me. It's too light.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ewers

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Not great pigment and it’s not smudge proof. I had to apply it several times to bring out the bolder brown I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Margo Giordano

customer_reviews.title: Fine
customer_reviews.text: This is nice, for smokey eyes. It ran down my face after a while and gave me raccoon eyes because it was hot outside but it was good for a while
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Does not last, comes off easily
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's easy to apply but just seems to come off during the day. More like ends up on my skin around my eyes and not where I put it.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Gear

customer_reviews.title: True to description:3
customer_reviews.text: I recommend buying this brand. It’s relatively cheap and works well! I definitely got more than my money’s worth honestly. Easy to use and pretty easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Atem

customer_reviews.title: Long wearing undereye or eyebrow pencil
customer_reviews.text: I use these Cover Girl eye pencils for both underlining my eyes (the dark brown/black, and Mink brown) and filling in or coloring over grey in my eyebrows (the Smoky Taupe), as they are very long-lasting and never irritate my eyes or skin. The undereye liner does not bleed as do other eye pencils (for example those made with kohl), and I never have to reapply this to either undereye or brow more than once with my morning makeup. The pencil consistency is firm yet colors as a crayon, unlike Maybelline which is so firm the color barely glides on.
customer_reviews.author: Jancal

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeliner. I'm a man, and I just use it a bit. Very easy to use and comes with a diffuser which is helpful. It doesn't irritate eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Itamar David

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Best pencil eyeliner. I’ve tried two faced, tarts, and other high end brands but always come back to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey G

customer_reviews.title: Simply a good product
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeliner. Can’t seem to find it in stores anymore, so I had to resort to buying it from here on Amazon. The color is great, doesn’t smudge, and is very easy to apply. I actually prefer pencil liners over liquid/gel.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: It’s a no
customer_reviews.text: This was very dry and didn’t go in well without pulling. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ahigh

customer_reviews.title: This goes on easy and stays put
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and I like how easy it is to set with a bit of eyeshadow
customer_reviews.author: Erica Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Was open when I got it. Runs, smudges , raccoon eyes all day.
customer_reviews.text: Received it open. Not happy. Used it and let me tell you- WORST EYE LINER EVER. Runs, smudges and gives your raccoon eyes all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Mnv

customer_reviews.title: So hard it hurts!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried numerous methods to soften this eye pencil up enough to apply it. Freshly sharpened, rubbed on my hand to warm it up, I go to apply and it feels like my eyelid will rip! Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Goes on great and last all day
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect eyeliner for me. Will purchase again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Nana52

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.  It is best eyeliner I've found in a while at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner. I think black eyeliner is too dark but I really like this very dark brown. Also love that it's a kohl pencil I can sharpen that doesn't smear
customer_reviews.author: Jtaylo

customer_reviews.title: Great for tracing around one’s eye
customer_reviews.text: Colors are bold, easy to use. So long as you can handle taking a sharp pencil and drawing on your eye, this will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: GirlMom2

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product--I use it every day and it's definitely easy to use and to take off (especially when I make mistakes--I can just wipe it off without makeup remover). It does smear easily (if you touch/rub it), but it won't come off with normal wear, and I don't get "raccoon eyes" at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Bush

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work. The color looks nice, but it's not creamy at all. It has the consistency of a coloring pencil. I have to apply it too hard (almost stick it in my eye) to make it work a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Ivannia Mena

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, but pencil does not go on smoothly
customer_reviews.text: The color is just right for me, but I have trouble getting the pencil to go on my eyelid. I may give the unopened pencil to someone who can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Martie Sluga

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Perfect eyeliner. Have been using it for years
customer_reviews.author: Lau

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner and brow filler
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this same eyeliner for years for eyeliner and brow filler. Great price on here. I do wish there was a pencil sharpener included but I bought one separately. Price was fantastic for two pencils.
customer_reviews.author: S. Covey

customer_reviews.title: Really great results!
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected but only received one. This has been my long time favorite eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Pastor

customer_reviews.title: Smooth easy to wear.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this before. Nice smooth application, lasts long, nice color.
customer_reviews.author: High hopes

customer_reviews.title: Have used for years and am pleased
customer_reviews.text: I have used this eyeliner for years, and like it very much. It is soft enough to apply for a slightly smudged look, and hard enough to apply a thin line. I would recommend and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Blend, perfect price
customer_reviews.text: I've used for years Easy to apply and stays on when it's hot out doors. Got it on Amazon at half the price I usually pay.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Feehan

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: The description of this product was right on. And it arrived timely.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don’t even waist your money on this, it doesn’t work or is pigmented
customer_reviews.author: Yamileth

customer_reviews.title: Eyeliner Pencil
customer_reviews.text: This is a great eyeliner pencil. I like the color because I have light colored hair.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Girl

customer_reviews.title: Black eyes 24h
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Soft And dark! I keep my eyes perfect for the while day! The sponge works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amaia

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Subtle
customer_reviews.text: I have hooded eyelids, so I find using liquid linear leaves me with no lid space. But this pencil linear gives you a nice and soft look.
customer_reviews.author: Rusha

customer_reviews.title: I did not expect them to be sent on a regular basis. I can't possibly use them that fast.
customer_reviews.text: I need to have them sent 2 or 3 times a year, no more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No color!
customer_reviews.text: Way too light...not charcoal at all. It barely shows up and you can't really press hard because it's your eye area. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: vv1

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Wears off, I reapply maybe 2-3 times a day. Smooth, non-irritating. Worth it, Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Found
customer_reviews.text: Used for years. But could not find after searching local stores. So looked & found on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Maribeth

customer_reviews.title: Nice application
customer_reviews.text: Nice application but it does smudge off...but I hjave purchased it before and will again
customer_reviews.author: Sybil E.

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Description!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered as per description the package of 2 and I received only 1 pen it is not accurate as per the webpage!
customer_reviews.author: BASEEM EID

customer_reviews.title: Color Darker
customer_reviews.text: The shade was darker than I expected. Needed it to be more grey.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner pencil for the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, stays on all day, and you sure can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jolly18

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great liner, the only reason I did do 5 is it’s a little dry going on with aging skin
customer_reviews.author: GinB

product_meta.title: Covergirl Perfect Blend Eyeliner Pencil, 110 Black Brown, 0.03 Fl Oz, 2 Count
product_meta.description: Color:BLACK BROWN| Size:2 CountColor:110 Black Brown | Size:2 Count COVERGIRL Perfect Blend Eye Pencil gives you all the blending power you need in a smooth glide eyeliner pencil. With this eye makeup, you'll be able to draw precise lines for a defined look or softly smudge with the gentle blender tip for a smoky eye look.
feature_bullets: Color:110 Black Brown  |  Size:2 Count COVERGIRL Perfect Blend Eye Pencil gives you all the blending power you need in a smooth glide eyeliner pencil. With this eye makeup, you'll be able to draw precise lines for a defined look or softly smudge with the gentle blender tip for a smoky eye look.

You know that clean, ageless skin is the foundation of a fabulous look and COVERGIRL foundations, powders, and concealers make it simple. Whatever your look, COVERGIRL cosmetics will outlast your longest day, keeping your face radiant and natural looking.

Whether you are going for a classic look that's the foundation of your style, trying an advanced technique, looking for a skin treatment or just to treat your skin, COVERGIRL makeup has the professional quality makeup to enhance your natural radiance.

COVERGIRL makeup gives you the makeup you need to be who you are. Fill your makeup bag with COVERGIRL products for eyes, lips, and face. COVERGIRL makeup helps you achieve the perfect brows, lashes, lips and contouring to show off your individual style!

COVERGIRL has your eye makeup needs covered with a wide range of makeup from mascara, eyeliner, & eyeshadow to lipstick, lip liner & lip gloss to blush, foundation & powder. COVERGIRL- I am what I make up.
